content.prompt: Which of the following best describes the claim communicated by the artist about the Peace of Westphalia?

choices.label: The treaty was a catastrophe for the Catholic side.
The treaty would be only a temporary break from religious conflicts.
The treaty would bring an end to the Protestant Reformation.
The treaty would lead to a new period of peace and prosperity.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim and/or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
